name: DO NOT SMILE
description:
DO NOT SMILE - Immerse yourself in a wonderful world where other laws of gravity apply. Play as a bizarre character and help him avoid dangerous traps. Every time you find yourself in a predicament try changing gravity and moving from the floor to the ceiling and back again.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Each game level is filled with various traps and quest items. You need to move around the level, bypassing the traps and completing the task. Carefully think over each of your actions, because the charges to change gravity are not infinite.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various levels
- Good soundtrack
